#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
main()
{
	int N,x,j,count=0;
	cin>>N;
	char a[N][100];int l[N],ans[N];
	for(x=0;x<N;x++)
	{
		cin>>a[x];
		l[x]=strlen(a[x]);
	}
for(x=0;x<N;x++)
{
	count=0;
	for(j=0;j<l[x];j++)
	{
		if(a[x][j]=='A'||a[x][j]=='D'||a[x][j]=='O'||a[x][j]=='P'||a[x][j]=='Q'||a[x][j]=='R')
		count++;
		else if(a[x][j]=='B')
		count+=2;
		else
		continue;
	}
	ans[x]=count;
}
for(x=0;x<N;x++)
cout<<ans[x]<<endl;	
}
